//
//         [TestSpaceAutomation (AutoGenerate = false)]
//
//     - To trigger manual generation invoke:
//
//         nuke --generate-configuration SpaceAutomation --host SpaceAutomation
//
// </auto-generated>
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

job("Name") {
    volumeSize = 1.gb
    cloneRepository = true
    git {
        depth = 10
    }
    startOn {
        gitPush {
            enabled = true
            branchFilter {
                +"refs/heads/include"
                -"refs/heads/exclude"
                +Regex("include")
                -Regex("exclude")
            }
            pathFilter {
                +"include-path"
                -"exclude-path"
            }
        }
        schedule { cron("* 0 * * *") }
    }
    failOn {
        nonZeroExitCode { enabled = false }
        testFailed { enabled = false }
        outOfMemory { enabled = false }
        timeOut {
            enabled = true
            timeOutInMinutes = 15
        }
    }
    container("mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:5.0") {
        resources {
            cpu = 2048
            memory = 4096
        }
        shellScript {
            content = "./build.sh Test"
        }
    }
}
